The US has spent $1 Trillion on the war on drugs since the Nixon administration. Meanwhile, drug overdose deaths in the US have tripled since 2000 and are now the leading cause of death for Americans under 50. #DrugWar #FailedPolicies #WarOnDrugs
End the war on drugs. Let's work towards decriminalizing people found in possession of drugs for personal use.#EndtheDrugWar
Legalize it not criminalize it. End the war on drugs now. #LegalizeIt #EndTheWarOnDrugs #DecriminalizationNow
All the energy and money used to fuel the war on drugs can either be put to better use or saved altogether. Let's end the war on drugs and invest in solving real problems. #EndTheWarOnDrugs

We continue to financially support and sustain the War on Drugs, despite multiple studies showing the policy is a failure. It's time to end the failed experiment and invest instead in solutions that truly address the issue.
If we really want to end the drug problem, instead of incarceration, we should use tax revenue to fund alternative resources for users, like treatment and education programs. #endthewarondrugs

Legalizing drugs would reduce crime and violence associated with drug cartels and make it harder for kids to gain access to dangerous substances, among many other benefits. It's time to start investing in public health, not police and jails. #endthewarondrugs

The war on drugs criminalizes poverty. We cannot break through the cycle of poverty by encouraging an impulsive push from police to judge. We need criminal justice to be redefined and reprograms that actually address the root of drug-related crime. #WeMustDoBetter

Decriminalization is key to effectively tackling the drug crisis. The War on Drugs has proven to be damaging, invasive, and unsuccessful. It's time to look towards more progressive solutions. #EndTheDrugWar
Just because marijuana is not yet fully legalized, doesn't mean we should condone any forms of discrimination against those who choose to use it. #StopTheWarOnDrugs

The War on Drugs has been a massive failure. Governments have expended billions of dollars and have nothing to show for it. We must invest in better health and social measures. #DrugPolicyReform #EndTheWarOnDrugs

Drugs should be treated as a health issue - not a criminal one. Studies have shown that people who are addicted to drugs need treatment, not punishment and that criminal justice resources need to be fairer and more just. #endthedrugwar #LegalizeDrugs

Crazy how fast facts about illegal immigration get twisted for political gain. The truth?  The U.S. population is growing at its slowest pace in more than 80 years due to declining birth rates.  Immigration — legal and illegal — is actually the only thing keeping the population from shrinking.

US border apprehensions are rising to the highest levels since the early 2000s due to foreign nationals taking advantage of our broken immigration system and attempting to enter illegally. We need to secure our borders, fix our immigration laws and fight human traffickers. #StopIllegalImmigration

America should not be divided by race or immigration status. Everyone should be treated with dignity and respect. Legal immigration is an essential part of our nation’s greatness #WeAreAllImmigrants #ImmigrationReform #NoBanNoWall

Immigration is an important issue for countries around the world. We must find a way to navigate our current crisis in a humane, logical, and fair way that protects our borders and ensures freedom of movement. It is possible! #immigrationreform

Immigration laws and policies are a collective responsibility. Congress must work together to fix the broken system and create meaningful and practical reform that works for everyone. #immigrationreform

Immigration is not just a political hot potato, it's an incredibly complex issue. While we debate, families live in fear and thousands of children go without stable homes. Let’s find a solution that’s humane and effective. #CompassionNotPolitics

#SayNoToDivision  We can't afford to remain divided in this time of adversity. Let us come together and focus on the issues that unite us instead of the ones that divide us.  Rise above the propaganda and explore the possibilities with unity!

We need more immigration reform that focuses on integrated solutions. We need better border protection to reduce the risk of illegal immigration, yet also create a system that sets out to attract and retain the most passionate, talented and skilled immigrants who will be contributors to society.

#ImmigrationReform isn't just about who gets to pass through the border—it's about how we treat each other on a human level, upholding human rights and basic dignities. Can we make a better world where everyone is respected, no matter where they come from?

We must come together to solve the immigration crisis and ensure everyone is free to pursue the American Dream. We must unite to reform immigration laws, create borders that are secure, and open our arms for those in need of a home. #immigrationreform  #secureborders

No one should be judged or attacked, although we can still respect each other’s opinions and fight for what we believe in. #respectopinions #changetheworld

Christians, let’s be clear: We can vote for someone who is FOR Roe v Wade, WITHOUT hating the unborn! We can deny the murderous dictator Trump & vote for the OTHER candidates who will protect abortion rights & enable us to control our bodies without infringement! #ProtectRoe #RoevWade

Roe v. Wade isn’t just an argument about abortion rights, it’s an argument about individual freedom and reproductive autonomy! Politicians must uphold the constitutional right of women to make decisions over their own health and lives. #StandWithRoe

After the #SCOTUS overturned Louisiana's 'undue burden' abortion law, it is more clear than ever: I will always fight for women's autonomy over their own bodies and our reproductive rights, no matter the cost. #StandwithRoe #womensrights #abortionrights

Remember, none of us are free until we're all free. Opposing views on reproductive rights does not and should not mean limiting or removing them.  #stand4choice #rodewade #everybodywins

Roe v. Wade is being threatened by the people who should be protecting it. Let's do something about it before women's right to choose is a thing of the past. #ProtectRoe
